message.body: ss but I'd rather be sure. Sorry. He's a clever closet burglar.
Aethel is being treated at old marple vet for eating 8 oz of dark chocolate. Induced vomiting to be followed by activated charcoal. No signs of distre
Doing fine. Peeing lots from extra fluids. Will poop black stools for 3-4 days. He was a bit quiet this morning but full of pep now. He's such a sweet boy.
Nope. Teaches me for not checking present closet stuff. At least he didn't drink the Prosecco.
Only because he couldn't reach the glasses!
